name: Character Screen
description:
This is the code I created from a Vlog.

How this works:

A "stats" button will appear on the screen. Clicking it will open the "Character Screen". From there, you can view the information about the two characters, boy and girl.

You can unlock the boy's information by selecting the choices from the game (Learn boy's name, etc). 

You can find comments in the code which explains how this work.

(Yes, I plan making a YouTube Tutorial about this in 2021)

Important rpy files: 
  • custom_screens.rpy
  • script.rpy
  • LoveInterest.rpy
